scripts.contrib: echo "Thanks for contributing to Study Planner!"
scripts.save-plan-test: echo curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/plans/save -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"user_id":"<your-user-id>","title":"Test Plan","plan":{}}'
scripts.ai-plan-test: echo curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/ai/plan -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"tasks":[{"id":"t1","title":"Sample Task","course_id":"c1","estimated_hours":1}],"preferences":{"dailyHours":3},"useAI":false}' | jq '.'
